about.title: About
about.description: Student in BUT MMI at IUT de Lens, I am looking for a 9 to 10-week internship starting in April in the field of web development. Passionate and motivated, I have acquired skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL that I wish to put into practice within a dynamic team to contribute to concrete projects while continuing to learn.

services.title: What I Can Do
services.frontend_desc: My skills in HTML and CSS with a touch of JavaScript will be an asset in the various tasks you entrust to me.
services.backend_desc: I would also be able to use Php and its Laravel framework for more advanced development.
services.design_desc: In addition to providing development services, I can also help you design logos thanks to my skills with the Adobe suite.
